overview: Naiq Khan's agents have thrown a man named Abbas Ali (Sami Shihani), who did not pay back his rented home. Amir (Reza Beik Imanardi), son of the vice, takes Abbasali. Abbasali was arrested as a result of Naiyib Khan's complaint, and his daughter (Fariba Forouhar), who is ill, suffered a heart attack.
title: Hamisheh Ghahreman
